location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., USA

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。其行政首长为国务卿，总部设在华盛顿特区的雾谷地区。
description.en: The executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs, equivalent to the 'Ministry of Foreign Affairs' in other countries. Its head is the Secretary of State, and its headquarters is located in the Foggy Bottom neighborhood of Washington, D.C.

en: Federal government of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家政府，由宪法规定的三个分支组成：立法、行政和司法。美国国务院是其下属的行政部门之一。
description.en: The national government of the United States, composed of three distinct branches as established by the Constitution: legislative, executive, and judicial. The Department of State is one of its executive departments.

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院的前身，是美国在《宪法》下成立的第一个联邦行政机构，后于1789年9月更名为国务院。
description.en: The predecessor to the U.S. Department of State, it was the first federal executive department created under the Constitution, and was renamed the Department of State in September 1789.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院的行政首长，美国总统外交政策的主要顾问，美国内阁成员，在美国总统继任顺序中排在第四位。
description.en: The head of the U.S. Department of State, the principal foreign policy advisor to the President of the United States, a member of the U.S. Cabinet, and fourth in the presidential line of succession.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在文内被提及为时任美国国务卿。
description.en: American politician, mentioned in the text as the incumbent U.S. Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国开国元勋，被任命为美国首任国务卿。
description.en: A Founding Father of the United States, appointed as the first U.S. Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家元首、政府首脑和三军统帅。美国宪法规定总统负责外交事务。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the United States. The U.S. Constitution tasks the president with the conduct of foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国的最高法律。该宪法规定美国总统负责外交事务，并为美国外交部的成立提供了法律依据。
description.en: The supreme law of the United States. The Constitution stipulates that the President is responsible for foreign affairs and provided the legal basis for the establishment of the Department of Foreign Affairs.

en: United States Agency for International Development

description.zh-cn: 负责管理美国对外非军事援助的联邦机构，其活动受美国国务院支持并作为其下属机构运作。
description.en: A U.S. federal agency responsible for administering civilian foreign aid, supported by and operating as a subordinate agency of the Department of State.

en: Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院排名第三的官员，是国务卿与副国务卿缺席或有事时之代理人，管理多个地区事务局。
description.en: The third-ranking official in the Department of State, who serves as the Acting Secretary in the absence of the Secretary and Deputy Secretary, and oversees several regional bureaus.

nodes.id: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局

zh-cn: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局
en: Bureau of East Asian and Pacific Affairs

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院下属的机构，隶属于政务次卿，负责处理美国与东亚及太平洋地区国家和地区组织的外交关系。
description.en: A bureau within the U.S. Department of State, under the Under Secretary for Political Affairs, responsible for U.S. foreign policy and relations with countries and regional organizations in East Asia and the Pacific.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院是美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The Department of State is the executive department of the U.S. Federal Government responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府是美国的国家级政府。
description.en: The Federal Government of the United States is the national government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交部是美国国务院的前身，于1789年9月15日通过立法更名为美国国务院。
description.en: The Department of Foreign Affairs was the predecessor to the Department of State, which was renamed by an act of Congress on September 15, 1789.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本内容，马可·鲁比奥是时任美国国务卿。
description.en: According to the text, Marco Rubio is the incumbent U.S. Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 托马斯·杰斐逊是美国首任国务卿。
description.en: Thomas Jefferson was the first U.S. Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务卿直接对美国总统负责，是总统外交政策的主要顾问。
description.en: The Secretary of State reports directly to the President of the United States and serves as the President's principal foreign policy advisor.

description.zh-cn: 依据《美国宪法》，美国国会建立了美国外交部作为第一个联邦行政机构。
description.en: Based on the U.S. Constitution, the U.S. Congress established the Department of Foreign Affairs as the first federal executive department.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务卿是美国国务院的行政首长。
description.en: The Secretary of State is the head of the Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国国际开发署被列为美国国务院管理与行政办公室下的机构。
description.en: The United States Agency for International Development is listed as an agency under the Management & Administrative Offices of the Department of State.

description.zh-cn: 政务次卿是美国国务院的高级官员职位。
description.en: The Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs is a senior official position within the Department of State.

relationships.source: 美国国务院东亚暨太平洋事务局

description.zh-cn: 东亚暨太平洋事务局是政务次卿直属的机构之一。
description.en: The Bureau of East Asian and Pacific Affairs is one of the bureaus that reports to the Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs.
